paragraphs.body: Melendy Britt is an American actress who has been active in television and voice acting since the 1970s. Her most notable animated work is for Filmation, where she had voiced characters such as She-Ra, Princess Adora, and the second animated Batgirl (Jane Webb was the first). She also provided the voice for Penny, would-be love interest and aide to Plasticman.
paragraphs.text: Melendy Britt is an American actress who has been active in television and voice acting since the 1970s. Her most notable animated work is for Filmation, where she had voiced characters such as She-Ra, Princess Adora, and the second animated Batgirl (Jane Webb was the first). She also provided the voice for Penny, would-be love interest and aide to Plasticman.

paragraphs.body: Britt was born in Charlotte, North Carolina, and grew up in Houston, Texas. She has two daughters.
